info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 4:31PM EDT until May 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... Northern Dutchess County in east central New York... Columbia County in east central New York... Rensselaer County in east central New York... Southwestern Bennington County in southern Vermont... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nassau, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Pittsfield, Bennington, East Greenbush, Rensselaer, Great Barrington, Hudson, Chatham, Nassau, Williamstown, Claverack, Lee, Lenox, Livingston, Copake, Pownal, Sheffield, Stephentown, Pine Plains and New Lebanon. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
